remarks: Atom exchange combined with contraposition.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Jun-2012.)
statement:

hlatcon3 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ -. R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) -> -. P .<_ ( Q .\/ R ) ) $.
